item.title: A CVE Journey: From Crash to Local Privilege Escalation
item.description: This post is a complete walkthrough for the process of writing an exploit for CVE 2019-18634. I will talk about the methedologies used and why is it such a good bug to begin your real world exploitation skills. Prelude My journey started with a member in the OpenToAll slack group posting a link for some CVE advisory. Going through the advisory highlights some of the points which made me think I can use this bug for my first CVE POC.
